Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1970...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 4/16/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $4,744,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/1/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $14,112,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/9/1985 with a Broken Finger, out for 6 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/6/1986, off Montgomery Brewster (CBC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1986, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
